comment.author: 56659257@N05
comment._content:
Nice to see this aircraft again if only on screen. When with Mecon Oil it visited RAF Khormaksar, Aden and I used to see it parked on the civil ramp with a Curtiss Commando,
we are talking 1963/64. Shame she got broken up in Athens years later.

Regards and thanks,
Roger Carvell, Hitchin, England.
